mapper.select: select com_name from review group by com_name
select Max(review_num) as review_num from review

SELECT com_name as name, MAX(CASE WHEN rnum = 1 THEN keyword END) as gender, MAX(CASE WHEN rnum = 2 THEN keyword END) as addr, MAX(CASE WHEN rnum = 3 THEN keyword END) as detail_addr, keyword_count as member_idx FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, a.*, (SELECT count(*) FROM review r WHERE r.com_name = a.com_name) as keyword_count FROM (SELECT r.com_name, k.content as keyword, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM review r INNER JOIN keyword k ON k.idx = r.keyword WHERE com_name = #{com_name} GROUP BY r.com_name, k.content ORDER BY cnt DESC ) a ) b WHERE rnum <= 3 GROUP BY com_name, keyword_count
select * from review where member_idx = #{member_idx} and status='활성'
mapper.update: update review set status = '미활성' where member_idx = #{member_idx} and review_num = #{review_num}
